subject: SAP Solutions Architect
job_desc:
SAP Solution Architect, Remote working from the United States.
Summit is a growing natural gas utility providing safe, reliable, and clean-burning natural gas service to homes and businesses in Arkansas, Colorado, Maine, Missouri, and Oklahoma. Being part of the Summit team means embracing excellence, diversity, and innovation, committing to safety each and every day, and doing all that we can to serve each other, our customers, and the communities where we live. We aim to bring warmth and energy to everything we do.
POSITION SUMMARY:
The purpose of this role is to own and manage end-to-end architecture and service delivery for the SAP solutions and related integrations. The SAP Solution Architect will need to have in-depth knowledge and expertise around SAP products and processes and work enterprise-wide implementation of SAP S/4 HANA. The SAP Solution Architect will define the roadmap and strategy of the Summit Utilities SAP ecosystem. They will need to understand the big picture and be able to connect dots across SAP and Non-SAP technologies and develop solutions catering to cross-technology integrations with SAP. The SAP Solution Architect will ensure the solutions being designed to fit into the broader architectural landscape and technology ecosystem meet defined Enterprise Architecture standards. The SAP Solution Architect will help define solution strategy, drive design and technical implementation, and architect innovative solutions.
This position requires excellent client services and technical skills; expertise with architecture, design, and implementation of information security software, identity and access management system, or enterprise software; and documentation experience. Successful candidates should have a high energy level, and the ability to communicate clearly and effectively with both business and technical audiences.
PRIMARY DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
Manage Technical architecture analysis, research, design, and development of new functionality and integration with key applications and services under SAP ecosystems
Contributes to highly complex projects that require in-depth SAP technical knowledge.
Makes high-level design choices and dictates various processes, policies, and standards. Provide architecture and design guidance to the development team
Monitor the work of the technical team and ensure standards are adhered to in accordance with SAP’s Solution Extensions
Partner with business and Super Users to simplify and standardize processes to meet industry best practices and keep customizations in the core to the bare minimum
Broadly understand S/4 HANA and other SAP products
Work on cross-functional projects/teams to deliver technology solutions for the business, act as adviser and coach to junior team members.
Experience with implementing an S4/HANA multi-tiered SAP environment
Works with IT Business Analysts and development teams to deliver complex technology solutions.
Architecture strategy & roadmap - define and update solution roadmaps, architecture documents, and related artifacts
Architecture design for future and existing solutions, ensure that the technical components used to fit with the overall technology strategy. Ensure also that the architecture is communicated, understood, and adhered to.
Architecture Review – establish an Architecture Review Board to ensure that solutions are governed appropriately.
Help and review with the creation of training, product, and solution documentation

Bachelor's degree in related field required
Minimum 10+ years of IT implementation or consulting experience
Minimum 6 years Solution Design, Technical design, end-to-end architecting with SAP systems. Experience in the Azure platform is preferred.
Business process knowledge in key areas of SAP FICO, MM, reporting, integration technology desired
Demonstrated capability across SAP technical landscape and tools – Basis, Infrastructure, Development, Mobile, BTP, etc.
Ability to demonstrate a strong understanding of SAP applications, infrastructure, and security
Experience in designing all aspects of Cloud Infrastructure Architecture including Compute, Storage, Network, High Availability, Disaster recovery, and monitoring
Experience in installation and technical configuration of SAP S/4 HANA, Fiori, C4C , PO/PI, SAP CPI, Cloud connector, Solution Manager, Data Hub solutions within major cloud IaaS platforms is desirable
Must have development experience using ABAP objects, HANA SQL Programming, SAP Fiori Developments, OData developments. Must have good experience with SAP security concepts and must have implemented authorization checks in ABAP objects.

Proven leadership ability
Demonstrated executive presence and influence, ability to build client relationships and create client satisfaction throughout the application lifecycle
Ability to set and manage priorities judiciously
Excellent written and oral communication skills
Excellent interpersonal skills
Ability to articulate ideas to both technical and non-technical audiences
Exceptionally self-motivated and directed

Exceptional service orientation

Comfortable performing well under pressure.

Previous experience of defining architectural direction and harnessing innovation for business benefit and to support strategy.
Previous experience in building, maintaining, and influencing relationships with a range of stakeholders.
Previous experience in handling and distilling requirements into credible contextual architectures, roadmaps, and investment plans.
